title: Prohibits misleading statements regarding benefit maximums and limitations of benefits
summary: Prohibits misleading statements regarding benefit maximums and limitations of benefits, either orally or in writing and requires such benefit maximums and limitations to be stated in clear and plain language in the insurance contract or certificate.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting misleading statements regarding benefit maximums and limitations of benefits, either orally or in writing and requiring such benefit maximums and limitations to be stated in clear and plain language in the insurance contract or certificate
